name: SNAKE GO!
description:
The Classic Snake Game is Here!

Controls of the game is very simple. 

Click  to go up

Click  to go down 

Click  to go right

Click  to go left

Try not to eat wall / snake in the game. If you do then the game will lead to this stage, Which is simply Game Over message.

You can also adjust snake speed into Easy, Medium, and Hard mode in settings. Make your high score and master to the Hard Mode. Your Snake will evolve as big as by eating the Apple. Big Snake means more challenge! More Updates are coming soon.

Please feel free to share your valuable comments.  Go Snake Go!

Coming Soon:

! New Challenging Snake Levels

! Multiplayer Mode

! Time Countdown Challenge 

! Beautiful Game Environment and sound effects.
